bib.title: COVID-19 and Media datasets: Period-and location-specific textual data mining
bib.author: Mathieu Roche
bib.abstract: The vocabulary used in news on a disease such as COVID-19 changes according the period [4]. This aspect is discussed on the basis of MEDISYS-sourced media datasets via two studies. The first focuses on terminology extraction and the second on period prediction according to the textual content using machine learning approaches.
